page.title: 10HOUSING AND FARMING
page.content: The square is covered by farmland following a{rotation of crops.} The area is owned by Hon Mrs M Marten, but 2 separate farms work the land. Both have{large dairy herds}of about 200 cows each. The main farm sited in this area has{meadows}along the River Allen & managed{grassland.}The fishing rights belong to Crichel Estates & a syndicate. There are 25 acres of {managed mixed woodland.}The population is 8 & live in a farm, a disused mill, an old golf club house & 2 Estate owned bungalows let to 2 Wimborne District Council tenants who are not employed locally. 1 lady uses the bus service but she needs to cycle to Witchampton first. All homes have pets, phones, own transport & l or more drivers because of remote situation. Local doctors are some 6-8 miles away as are large shops.
